name: async-to-gen
description: Transform async functions to generator functions with speed and simplicity.
author: Lee Byron <lee@leebyron.com> (http://leebyron.com/)

scripts.test: DIFF=$(./async-to-gen test/source.js | diff test/expected.js -); if [ -n "$DIFF" ]; then echo "$DIFF"; exit 1; fi; RES=$(node -e 'require("./register");require("./test/test-node-module.js")'); if [ "$RES" != 42 ]; then echo 'Node register hook failed'; exit 1; fi; ASYNC_NODE=$(./async-node ./test/test-node-module.js); if [ "$ASYNC_NODE" != 42 ]; then echo 'async-node failed'; exit 1; fi; ASYNC_GEN_NODE=$(./async-node ./test/test-async-generator.js); if [ "$ASYNC_GEN_NODE" != 42 ]; then echo 'async-node failed for async generators'; exit 1; fi; ./async-to-gen test/memtest.js | node --max-old-space-size=10;
